## NgwMap.addControl() method

Organized addition to the map design and controls elements, calling `control.onAdd(this.webMap.mapAdapter)`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addControl<K extends keyof MapControls>(controlDef: K | C, position: ControlPositions, options?: MapControls[K]): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  controlDef | K \| C |  |
|  position | ControlPositions | position relative to the map angles |
|  options | MapControls\[K\] | initialization parameters if the control is set as a string value |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Example


```javascript
ngwMap.addControl(new CustomControl(), 'bottom-left');
ngwMap.addControl('ZOOM', 'top-right')

```
